/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The street itself is lined with trees, adding a touch of green to the concrete jungle. Cars of different colors are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
